inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Javelin', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Short Spear', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Long Spear', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Master Training, Spears
description: You do an additional 1x damage on critical hits with javelins, short spears, and long spears.
